reviewText: I tried to get into treatment dozens of times, but always backed out.  I was scared to death of a life without drugs.  This film took that fear away.  Dr. Hansen's words calmed me and gave me the confidence to look for help.  I entered a 30 day rehab then spent three months in outpatient.  I am 13 months sober for the first time in almost 20 years.  I am so thankful I found this film.
